Translations.Text: Ur twalav ara, Nuzen ed ccwaien i ijehliyen, la ten laajen s ljuo
Ur peiri fellasen, la Nessalay kan leesab nnsen
Ass ideg ara Nefser wid ipeezziben ar Uenin, d imaaoaven
a Nenheo ijehliyen, d aqwvao, ar Loahennama
Ur sain ccafuaa, siwa win iu$en lemaahda ar Uenin
Segs, qoib flan igenwan, tcerreg tmurt, grurjen idurar s edie
Gren aS mmi S, i Uenin
Ur iwjib ara, i Uenin, ad Isau mmi S
Akken llan di tmurt akked igenwan, siwa ay d iteddun, ar Uenin, s waabad
Ih, Ieseb iten, Issen nezzeh amvan nnsen
Akw a d asen $uoeS, ass n tnekra, yiwen yiwen
War ccekk, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Iauzz Uenin
Nerra t kan d ushil, s tmeslayt ik, iwakken a pbeccoev, syis, wid ieezzben, u a pnedoev agdud iggernenn
Aceal isuta ay Nesqucc uqbel nnsen! Day a pmagrev yiwen degsen, ne$ a ppeslev i uswecwec nnsen
